options.text: AI accuracy might not meet creative standards.
options.why: Misaligned output could lead to rework, reducing efficiency.

options.text: AI model bias could affect creative output quality.
options.why: Ensuring unbiased AI is crucial for maintaining creative integrity and user trust.
assumptions: AI model training data is diverse

options.text: Integration with existing tools may face technical challenges.
options.why: Seamless integration is crucial for user adoption and efficiency.
